quote: An approximate answer to the right question is worth a great deal more than a precise answer to the wrong question. – John Tukey
fact: The pop you hear when you crack your knuckles is actually a bubble of gas burning.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why are giraffes so slow to apologize? Because it takes them a long time to swallow their pride.
